Package org.yajasi.JungleJepps.db

This package manages all the database connections and settings.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DatabaseConnection This interface is used to define a connection to a database for use in Jungle Jepps.
 

Class Summary
DatabaseManager This class is used to manage the database connections and the settings connection.
DataMerge  
OperationsDatabase  
PrimaryJdbcSource  
SettingsManager This class is used to store all the persistent settings.
 

Enum Summary
Settings This file represents an ENUM for every setting needed for Jungle Jepps Desktop configuration.
 

Exception Summary
DatabaseException This class an exception used to abstract all possible errors in using the database connection.
 

Package org.yajasi.JungleJepps.db Description

This package manages all the database connections and settings. The class DatabaseManager should be used to access the loaded database connection as well as the SettingsManager.

DatabaseManager.getDatabase()
DatabaseManager.getSettings()
